Room.Name: Hillborough Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Hillborough Way, between the Shrine of Poseidon and the Pub.
Room.LongDescription: The Groggy Thimble Pub is located on the south side of the road, and caters to all kinds of people, from sailors to peasants to adventurers. The Pub is a good place to hang out and meet people. On the north side of the road is the Shrine of Poseidon, one of the many gods of the oceans that many sailors pray to before disembarking on a long voyage.
